__e: What can come to us without tricks?
You know I wouldn't pull a thing like this on you.
Someone should have taught this kid not to throw cheap shots.
You think I couldn't handle a crummy job like that?
You just need me to stay here in my miserable job, so I can help Mum and Dad.
Nope, this is my way of saying you were doing a crappy job before; you will a slightly crappier job now.
No, I don't even like it, but I've had a bad day.
All this stupid little country have to do is stand in line... and do what it's told for one miserable day!
No matter what you been through during the day, coming home to something like this...
